SamPy.pca.SMNpcaÂ¶

This Python module contains principle component analysis (PCA).

It is SMN’s adaptation and no guarantees for correct results are made. So do not complain to me if it does not work ;-)

requires:NumPy
requires:matplotlib
author:Sami-Matias Niemi
contact:niemi@stsci.edu
date:14/11/08 Initial Version
version:0.1a

Classes

SMNpca(inputMatrix[, stdnorm]) This class calculates the principle component analysis (PCA).
